channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description:
I didn’t go to the High Park bike protest tonight for the same reasons I left the bike party last month: As a non-owner, I didn’t think I’d feel like I’d be part of it and I didn’t have anybody to meet up with.

Normally I go to protests I support, even if I don’t know anybody there, so that at least I’d increase the count by one. This one felt different. I didn’t feel like increasing the bike share user count by one.
item.source:markdown:
I didn’t go to the High Park bike protest tonight for the same reasons I left the bike party last month: As a non-owner, I didn’t think I’d feel like I’d be part of it and I didn’t have anybody to meet up with.
Normally I go to protests I support, even if I don’t know anybody there, so that at least I’d increase the count by one. This one felt different. I didn’t feel like increasing the bike share user count by one.

item.description: Every time I have anything key lime flavored, I think of Dexter. https://t.co/qVtHz9t9xk

item.description: When the DOJ gets permission to release the Mar-a-Lago search warrant and redacted property receipt, it’s going to be a scan of a paper document, isn’t it?

item.description:
I’ll put up $1,000 of my own money so that Joseph can get this. Who’s with me? https://t.co/2btUN6nRcE

I know that’s a small amount compared to the asking price, but it’s a start.
item.source:markdown:

item.description: @mrmeseeksff @MrTherapyDog @swimshady816 I think about that scene, especially the line “He mean Lexus but he ain’t know it,” at least once a day.

item.description: @warrenhuska @AlexDRMather @DTAHtoronto @TorontoPFR @moddevelopments @DiamondSchmitt Adelaide St. W. and Brant.
item.source:markdown: @warrenhuska @AlexDRMather @DTAHtoronto @TorontoPFR @moddevelopments @DiamondSchmitt Adelaide St. W. and Brant.

item.description: @AlexDRMather @DTAHtoronto @TorontoPFR @moddevelopments @DiamondSchmitt I live nearby, and it’s a big hit. When the food hall opens, it might be hard to find a seat (that’s a good problem for a park to have). The dog park is often full (which means people and the dogs who own them love it) and kids seem to enjoy the playground. Just a huge success.
item.source:markdown: @AlexDRMather @DTAHtoronto @TorontoPFR @moddevelopments @DiamondSchmitt I live nearby, and it’s a big hit. When the food hall opens, it might be hard to find a seat (that’s a good problem for a park to have). The dog park is often full (which means people and the dogs who own them love it) and kids seem to enjoy the playground. Just a huge success.

item.description: @_jackiewong @overloaded_writ The grocery store was a classic, with a diner inside it. The mural is amazing because, well, I’ll leave it up to the crowdfunding campaign video to explain why: https://t.co/Y3bWqHy6fa

item.description: @_jackiewong @overloaded_writ This is terrific. The Leung family is legendary in the Comox Valley (where I’m from). The grocery store is so iconic that there’s a mural of it on the building where it once stood. https://t.co/7idxGTiEQq
item.source:markdown: @_jackiewong @overloaded_writ This is terrific. The Leung family is legendary in the Comox Valley (where I’m from). The grocery store is so iconic that there’s a mural of it on the building where it once stood. https://t.co/7idxGTiEQq

item.description: @skinnylatte TIL that this book is a) real and b) categorized as “Humour/Reference” (i.e. half silly, half serious). If it didn’t already exist, I’d help fund its publication. https://t.co/SI2QbPQIp5
item.source:markdown: @skinnylatte TIL that this book is a) real and b) categorized as “Humour/Reference” (i.e. half silly, half serious). If it didn’t already exist, I’d help fund its publication. https://t.co/SI2QbPQIp5

item.description:
I would’ve been a handsome hero today if I had happened to have hand lotion on me, but I didn’t, so I wasn’t. What I’m trying to tell you is that I just bought hand lotion.

My handsome heroism today was limited to offering to take a group’s photo. Any time I see someone breaking off from a group to take a photo (or what looks like is going to be a bad group selfie [Hint: almost all group selfies are bad]), I wordlessly offer to take it for them.
item.source:markdown:
I would’ve been a handsome hero today if I had happened to have hand lotion on me, but I didn’t, so I wasn’t. What I’m trying to tell you is that I just bought hand lotion.
My handsome heroism today was limited to offering to take a group’s photo. Any time I see someone breaking off from a group to take a photo (or what looks like is going to be a bad group selfie [Hint: almost all group selfies are bad]), I wordlessly offer to take it for them.

item.description: Are there grocery stores that sell everything normal grocery stores sell, except in half the portions? Y’know, for single people who live alone?
item.source:markdown: Are there grocery stores that sell everything normal grocery stores sell, except in half the portions? Y’know, for single people who live alone?

item.description: @toddsieling There’s a desktop mode, easily accessible, which seems pretty open, i.e. you can install software by downloading it from a browser. I didn’t do any unlocking or rooting to install itch.​io games, for example. I just had to install the Linux desktop client and login.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling There’s a desktop mode, easily accessible, which seems pretty open, i.e. you can install software by downloading it from a browser. I didn’t do any unlocking or rooting to install itch.​io games, for example. I just had to install the Linux desktop client and login.

item.description: @toddsieling 🤔 I just found a less fiddly way to install Epic Games Store games, so maybe I’ll try that again. I installed the https://t.co/QLPPDNTSSB launcher almost right after unboxing, though.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling 🤔 I just found a less fiddly way to install Epic Games Store games, so maybe I’ll try that again. I installed the https://t.co/QLPPDNTSSB launcher almost right after unboxing, though.

item.description: @toddsieling I do. I like it, but I don’t see myself using it for anything other than small games, or soothing exploration games. There’s one game that I’d play a lot on it if it were still on Steam. I could install it if I fiddle a bunch, but would rather not do that.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling I do. I like it, but I don’t see myself using it for anything other than small games, or soothing exploration games. There’s one game that I’d play a lot on it if it were still on Steam. I could install it if I fiddle a bunch, but would rather not do that.

item.description:
I don’t want to alarm you, but I think I’ve settled on a clothing style where I both look good and feel comfortable.

It’ll make my dad so happy to learn that, just like him, I’m going to be well stocked in collared shirts.
item.source:markdown:
I don’t want to alarm you, but I think I’ve settled on a clothing style where I both look good and feel comfortable.
It’ll make my dad so happy to learn that, just like him, I’m going to be well stocked in collared shirts.

item.description: @anguspratt I have a cleaning service, since I don’t want to clean any of the surfaces in my place, though I only ever have them come in a day before I leave on an trip, so I can come back to a clean apartment. It’s all the other stuff like cooking and laundry that’s dull and time-consuming.
item.source:markdown: @anguspratt I have a cleaning service, since I don’t want to clean any of the surfaces in my place, though I only ever have them come in a day before I leave on an trip, so I can come back to a clean apartment. It’s all the other stuff like cooking and laundry that’s dull and time-consuming.
